Author: simplyskyla
Text: Not having enough healthy fats in your diet is one of the main reasons you stop getting your period, etc. it doesn’t really affect weight loss or gain like everyone says it does, unless it’s saturated fat. Unsaturated fats (like in avocados for example) are perfectly fine to eat and provide your body with nutrients it needs to prevent hair falling out/skin looking bad without causing weight gain. HOWEVER, if you’re only eating 300 calories a day even saturated fat won’t slow down/stop weight loss. I speak from experience— I’m an active person so I usually eat around 900 a day and sometimes my OMAD is just a box of Atkins Endulge candy bars (which for a whole box have 250% of your daily recommended saturated fat intake) and I’ll still wake up the next day lighter on the scale. Fat isn’t even like everyone says it is, it’s okay to eat!
